channel.title: [UK] Fabrice Muamba 'critical' after collapse in Spurs-Bolton match
channel.description:
Hope he gets well soon, I don't follow football nor do I support either of these teams, But its a sad thing to see nontheless
Fabrice Muamba 'critical' after collapse in Spurs-Bolton match Bolton Wanderers midfielder Fabrice Muamba is critically ill after collapsing during an FA Cup quarter-final tie against Tottenham. The 23-year-old is being treated in the intensive care unit of the heart attack centre at the London Chest Hospital. Muamba is said to be showing "real fight" in his battle for life. Medics spent six minutes trying to resuscitate him on the field after he fell to the ground with no other players around him.
Rest of the story here. http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/0/football/17417973

item.title: [UK] Fabrice Muamba 'critical' after collapse in Spurs-Bolton match
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Hope he gets well soon, I don’t follow football nor do I support either of these teams, But its a sad thing to see nontheless

Fabrice Muamba 'critical' after collapse in Spurs-Bolton match

Bolton Wanderers midfielder Fabrice Muamba is critically ill after collapsing during an FA Cup quarter-final tie against Tottenham.

The 23-year-old is being treated in the intensive care unit of the heart attack centre at the London Chest Hospital.

Muamba is said to be showing “real fight” in his battle for life.

Medics spent six minutes trying to resuscitate him on the field after he fell to the ground with no other players around him.

Rest of the story here.

BBC Sport

Bolton's Fabrice Muamba collapses during Spurs-Bolton match

Bolton Wanderers midfielder Fabrice Muamba collapses on the pitch during an FA Cup quarter-final against Tottenham.
